java.lang.Cloneable
public class Circle
extends Shape2D

The Circle class is representing a simple geometric circle with a border.

Since:
January 19th, 2010

Method Detail

calculateContour

protected void calculateContour(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> outContour,
                                java.util.ArrayList<double[]> inContour)
Description copied from class: Shape2D
Calculates the vertices lying on the shapes contour. Either the contour of the whole shape (outShape) or the contour of a smaller version of the shape (inShape), that is used to apply a border around the shape. If inContour is null only the outer contour will be calculated.

Specified by:
calculateContour in class Shape2D
Parameters:
outContour - List storing vertices of the shapes contour.
inContour - List storing vertices of the shapes border.

generateDisplayList

                                GLU glu)
Description copied from class: Shape2D
Generates the shape's display list.

Specified by:
generateDisplayList in class Shape2D
Parameters:
gl - OpenGL pipeline object.
glu - OpenGL utility library object.
